ValidationRule.description: Lab tech cannot set the Claim Sub Stage to "Approved"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = 'Lab Technician', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) = 'In Lab', ISCHANGED(Claim_Sub_Stage__c), TEXT(Claim_Sub_Stage__c) = 'Approved' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not permitted to move to change the Claim Sub Stage to "Approved"
